participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

CBRS_3.Description: 3. Is always "on the go" or acts as if driven by a motor

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

CBRS_9.Description: 9. Avoids, expresses reluctance about, or has difficulties engaging in tasks that require sustained mental effort (such as schoolwork or homework)

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

CBRS_10.Description: 10. Has difficulty sustaining attention in tasks or play activities

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

CBRS_20.Description: 20. Does not seem to listen to what is being said to him/her

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

CBRS_23.Description: 23. Runs about or climbs excessively in situations where it is inappropriate

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

CBRS_29.Description: 29. Does not follow through on instructions and fails to finish schoolwork, chores or duties in the workplace (not due to oppositional behavior or failure to understand instructions)

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

CBRS_30.Description: 30. Has difficulty organizing tasks and activities

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

CBRS_41.Description: 41. Fails to give close attention to details or makes careless mistakes in schoolwork, work, or other activities

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

CBRS_42.Description: 42. Has difficulty waiting in lines or awaiting turn in games or group situations

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

CBRS_49.Description: 49. Interrupts or intrudes on others (e.g., butts into others' conversations or games)

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

CBRS_55.Description: 55. Fidgets with hands or feet or squirms in seat

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

CBRS_59.Description: 59. Has difficulty playing or engaging in leisure activities quietly

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

CBRS_71.Description: 71. Loses things necessary for tasks or activities (e.g., school assignments, pencils, books, tools or toys)

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

CBRS_76.Description: 76. Leaves seat in classroom or in other situations in which remaining seated is expected

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)

CBRS_80.Description: 80. Blurts out answers to questions before the questions have been completed

Levels.2: Pretty much true (Often, Quite a Bit)
Levels.3: Very much true (Very Often, Very Frequent)
